attributes.action: Demand Greater Manchester Police Reopen The Investigation Into The Manchester Dog's Home Fire
attributes.additional_details:
We respectfully request the Greater Manchester Police to investigate further and to seek charges against the two boys for the fire at Manchester Dogs Home, Moss Brook Road,
Harpurthey on 11th Sept 2014 in which 50 dogs died.
The suffering those dogs went through cannot be allowed to go unpunished.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
